title: Spratly Islands
description: China was building its first airstrip on the Spratly Islands only to provide supply and maintenance for passing ships. China had constructed a landmass that was capable of housing a 3,000-metre long runway. It said that People's Liberation Army Air Force runways on the mainland varied from about 2,700 metres to 4,000 metres.
